summary: t they want to buy. That is where the iTabMenu's digital storefront comes in. The digital storefront serves as a catalog of all the products available in your store or restaurant. It allows customers to browse through the products, learn more about them, and make informed decisions about their purchase. By streamlining this process, iTabMenu helps automate the customer service aspect of your establishment, making it more efficient and ultimately more successful.
